DOC.brief_summary: 400 healthy woman need contraception ask participate study . Half give EVRA , half give FC Patch low . They expect apply patch 21 day cycle , 7 cycle total . The study compare pattern menstrual bleed two treatment , plus effective preventing pregnancy , general safety , acceptability participant .
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman request contraception age 1835 year old Smokers must older 30 time informed consent History regular cyclic menstrual period , normal cervical smear Pregnancy lactation Obesity ( BMI > 30 ) , hypersensitivity ingredient study drug , significant skin reaction transdermal preparation , diseases/conditions compromise function body system ( result alter absorption/accumulation/ metabolism/excretion study drug ) , diseases / condition may worsen hormonal treatment
